| Improve this Doc View Source

PrintContracts(List<Contract>, Boolean)

Prints the contracts from arguments. Warning, contracts have a lot of variations and this function is quite extensive in its printing. Use listPublic if you're trying to print public contracts.

Declaration
public void PrintContracts(List<Contract> contracts, bool listPublic = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<ESI.NET.Models.Contracts.Contract> contracts

List of contracts to print
System.Boolean listPublic

Whether public contract is being printed

| Improve this Doc View Source

PrintObjList<T>(List<T>, Int32, Int32, List<String>, List<String>)

Prints a list of json-convertible objects as a table, with a given cell width and number of rows. Only prints the fields named in the "fields". If a field is an ID field, also resolves it's name before printing.

Declaration
public void PrintObjList<T>(List<T> objList, int width, int rows, List<string> fields, List<string> fieldDesc)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<T> objList

List of items to print
System.Int32 width

Table cell width
System.Int32 rows

Number of rows. If it's less than the length of "objList", prints only the first "rows" items.
System.Collections.Generic.List<System.String> fields

Keys of the fields to print.
System.Collections.Generic.List<System.String> fieldDesc
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

JObject-convertible type
| Improve this Doc View Source

PrintTableHeader(List<String>, Int32)

Prints the header of a table, which contains the given fields, with a cell width of "width".

Parameters
